Posts.Title: Hard Knots After Lumpectomy? Pam456 Pam456

Posts.Content: Apr 24, 2009 01:30PM Pam456 wrote: Thanks girls for your encouraging responses.  I am definitely hoping for silly!  I am ready to get on with my life and not be constantly seeing doctors and worrying about this.  I'm sure everyone here wants the same thing.  Thanks again.
Posts.Title: About To Panic Again! Pam456 Pam456

Posts.Content: Pam456 wrote: I posted this about three weeks ago and got no response, which scared me even more.  I figured that no one else had had the same experience.  But I am going to try again.  I was diagnosed with early stage IDC in late January, had SNB and lumpectomy 2/16, MammoSite 2/23-2/27 and started on Femara In March.  I have a fairly large hard lump just to the left of my nipple and about two inches below the lumpectomy incision.  My surgeon says "it could be cancer, but I don't think so!"  My radiation/oncologist says "it could be a result of the radiation"  They both say the only to know for sure is another biopsy and they are reluctant to do that so soon after surgery.  I can't believe this is happening just 3 months after a supposedly tiny tumor (and nothing else anywhere in the breast) was found.  I am trying really hard not to panic.  Has anyone else had a similar experience. Dx 1/26/2009, IDC, <1cm, Stage IA, Grade 2, 0/1 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: About To Panic Again! Pam456 Pam456
